title: Compare sound waves to radio waves

content.prompt: Both the sound and radio waves are present inside the car. Which of the following is true about these waves?

choices.label: Both waves travel at the speed of light.
Sound waves require a medium in which to propagate and radio waves do not.

topic.text: 14.1: Properties of Wave Pulses and Waves

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
